attributes.action: change parole rules to allow someone who continuously protests their innocence to be eligible for parole after a maximum period specified as part of the sentence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The insistence that a person admits their guilt to qualify for parole effectively exacerbates existing miscarriages of justice.  If the prisoner has shown good behaviour and other signs that they are safe to be released then they should have the right to be judged on those criteria.
